Tasks.Task Description: Continuously monitor the utilization of Power BI Embedded capacity to ensure optimal performance and avoid overloading. Adjust capacity as needed.

Tasks.Task: Update Power BI Reports and Dashboards
Tasks.Task Description: Regularly update and maintain Power BI reports and dashboards to reflect the latest data and business requirements.
Conduct regular security audits to ensure that Power BI Embedded environments comply with organizational security policies and best practices.
Ensure that Power BI workspaces and their associated data are backed up regularly to prevent data loss.
Analyze and optimize the performance of Power BI reports to ensure fast loading times and efficient data processing.
Monitor and review the usage of Power BI APIs to ensure compliance with usage limits and avoid disruptions.
Regularly test embedded scenarios to ensure that Power BI Embedded integrations are functioning as expected.
Ensure that the latest versions of Power BI Embedded SDKs and libraries are used to maintain compatibility and security.
Review and update user access permissions to ensure that only authorized users have access to Power BI Embedded resources.
Maintain detailed documentation of all maintenance activities, including updates, optimizations, and security audits.
Develop and execute plans for scaling Power BI Embedded capacity based on usage trends and future requirements.

Tasks.Task: Engage in Training and Skill Development
Tasks.Task Description: Ensure that the team responsible for Power BI Embedded operations participates in regular training to stay updated with new features and best practices.
Regularly review and update data sources connected to Power BI Embedded to ensure data accuracy and reliability.
Conduct drills to prepare for potential incidents affecting Power BI Embedded, ensuring the team is familiar with response protocols.
